entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 6.0.302 AddRazorRuntimeCompilation breaks global usings in MVC app #42839
  • Asp Net Core Identity. After publishing each release validation token is not valid #42837
  • [Blazor] @onkeydown:preventDefault not working on mobile browsers #42836
  • Simplify authentication setups with a defaultSchemeSelector overload #42834
  • ASP.NET 6 JSON special characters serialization issue #42833
  • Add TlsConnectionOptions to connection abstractions #42831
  • Enable zero byte reads for StreamPipeReader usage in ASP.NET Core #42829
    7.0-rc1
  • [Discussion] Single authentication scheme is treated as default scheme #42828
    Discussions

Closed

  • Address dotnet-user-jwts prebuilt in source-build #42599
    7.0-rc1
  • Reset the Counter on a Specific RateLimiter #42729
  • Certificate authentication fails validation when intermediate certificate isn't in store #42010
    Discussions
  • [7.0.100-rc.1.22365.7] Behavior difference when add Authentication in web applications #42808
    7.0-rc1
  • Connection disconnected with error 'Error: Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message from the server.'. #42778
  • Issue with IAccessTokenProvider on iOS devices #42805
  • Installer only get Shared in .\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #42503

PullRequests

Created

  • IdentityUI: Fix focus contrast #42840
    area-identity
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Add dotnet-sourcebuild-externals reference for user-jwts dependencies #42822
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix typo #42823
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump terser from 5.14.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/Components/Web.JS #42835
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-rc1
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-rc.1.22368.21 #42803
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Move builds to MacOS 11 #42791
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [blazor] Obsolete InvokeUnmarshalled #42814
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42821
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Do not treat warnings as errors for `SendHelixJob` #42826
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Remove 20H2 from the test matrix #42819
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Trim identity #42675
    area-identity
  • Update templates to incorporate net7 changes #42802
    area-mvc
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42795
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42793
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • [wip][blazor] Delegate loading of assets to runtime #42770
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
